title: Memetic Kill Agent Archive
content:

[[module Rate]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:cyberpunk theme-number=1]]

A project by:

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:memetic-killagent-archive/Secure%20Cyber%20Protection]]

Secure Cyber Protection (S.C.P) is a foundation front company specializing in the development of advanced cyber defense technologies. Underneath its surface, it covertly conducts experiments and develops webcrawlers and various memetic kill agents for SCiPnet's security.

//"Secure Cyber Protection, your advanced defense against evolving cyber threats. From cutting-edge malware defenses to robust encryption, we safeguard businesses and individuals with confidence in the digital era."// â€”Dr. Siddharth Vyas, CEO & CTO at Secure Cyber Protection Inc.

----

This archive contains a collection of various memetic kill agents that have been developed by Secure Cyber Protection Inc. for the purpose of preventing unauthorised access to classified information.

Meet COMS, an advanced artificially intelligent security software installed into Site-999's SCiPnet database.

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:memetic-killagent-archive/COMS]]

[[=]]
++ MEMETIC KILL AGENT ARCHIVE
[Codename: M3m371c5]
[[/=]]
----
[[module ListUsers users="."]]
Welcome, %%title%%.
[[/module]]
You now have access to all experimented prototypes developed by Secure Cyber Protection Inc.

The following kill agents possess quasi-sentient characteristics and were developed as part of the next-generation security initiative under Project "M3m3-K1ll3r."

Unlike conventional kill agents, which follow an indefinitely repeating pattern, these specialized agents contain a quasi-sentient entity embedded within the image. This entity is capable of triggering lethal effects within the human brain, resulting in immediate fatality.

The following kill agents were proposed by Dr. Alexander Avenlee and Dr. Quasar Starfield.

Additional kill agents will be appended to this file upon their development completion.

[[=]]
